SHARE PRINT Facebook Twitter Delicious StumbleUpon Home > Travel Guides > United States > Texas > Waco > Waco Restaurants > Fazoli's Waco OVERVIEW HOTELS VACATION RENTALS THINGS TO DO RESTAURANTS TRIP PLANS MAP DEALS
Fazoli's , Waco 5201 W Waco Dr, Waco, TX 76710 AVERAGE USER RATING Cuisine: Italian Restaurants Contact: (254) 776-1324 Visit Website View more information on Yahoo! Local No Photos Available Image Search» See all Waco Restaurants» Map Add to Trip Loading... Interactive Map of Waco, TX Expand Full List Show Fewer Results Refresh Map Items Reset Map Map Refresh On? By keeping map refresh on, you will see new search results as you move the map. Yes, keep on No, turn it off Updating Map WRITE A REVIEW Yahoo! User Reviews Reviews for Fazoli's: 1 AVERAGE OVERALL RATING USER RATING By A Yahoo! Contributor , 9/18/09 We visited this restaurant today and got treated reallly stupidly. When we pulled up to the order placing area outside of the place and placed our order, no one responded right away. When I heard a voice I gave my order, the next thing I knew someone came on and asked me for our order. I told them that I had already ordered and was informed that they did not have my order. I gave it again and drove forward to the delivery window. I asked them why I received such poor customer service and they advised me that I was dealing with a recording that is used to warn them that someone is there. What the Hell kind of customer service is this anyway? Why did I have to give my order twice? Does your company think that people are too stupid to know what they want to eat before they pull up to an order window at a fast food restaurant??? I will try your establishment one more time and if I am treated with the low respect again, I will not go there again and I will tell everyone I come in contact with about the poor service I received and let them know that you guys think people are stupid and have to be baited to eat something other than what they wanted. If you want to respond to this message, you can reach me at knight2965@yahoo.com. If I hear nothing I will be convinced that you do not care about your customers. Was this review helpful?
